official_title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service being constructed at 680 Central Avenue in Barboursville, West Virginia, as the "John D. Rockefeller, IV, Post Office".

summary.text: Designates the United States Postal Service facility at 680 Central Avenue in Barboursville, West Virginia, as the John D. Rockefeller, IV, Post Office.
